sentence: Around the same time, Josh Mandel, the forty-four-year-old former Ohio state treasurer, who overtook Gibbons in one recent poll, released an ad that begins with an Ohio woman saying critical race theory is “crap.” It then cuts to Mandel on the Edmund Pettus Bridge, in Selma, saying, “Martin Luther King, Jr., marched right here so skin color wouldn’t matter.” x NEW: Christian Dominionists who envision a theocratic takeover of the U.S. government have long sought to remake the nation in their image.
